subject: One of my swords
msgSnippet: I m new here and I wanted to show everyone one of my swords.  It was given to me by my grandfather.  I think it is Shinto or Shinshinto. I ve been told both.

I'm new here and I wanted to show everyone one of my swords.  It was 
given to me by my grandfather.  I think it is Shinto or Shinshinto.  
I've been told both.  I've got lots more pics if anybody would like 
to see them.  I would love to hear any comments anyone here has.  
Thanks
